Name: Canopic Osiris
Description: This terracotta figurine represents Osiris in the form of a canopic jar. He is dressed in a "nemes" surmounted by the horns of a ram, by the solar disk and feathers. The god is wearing a  collar of round plates and a large naos-shaped pectoral. The jar is a cultic image of the god of the dead and in addition a sacred recipient destined to contain the fertile water from the Nile.
